post.title: xbox 360 with built-in blu-ray coming soon!
post.content: according to a source from taiwan, an oem will start manufacturing xbox 360 with blu-ray "built-in" at q3. so we maybe able to find one of those during q4 holiday season, or early 2009. this is already reported in taiwan news. http://www.digitimes.com/newsshow/ne...uery=blu%2dray edited to add news link.
